title: MacroCoachAPI
desc: FastAPI backend for tracking weight/macros, storing history, and generating weekly insights.

title: Personal Website
desc: Responsive portfolio website with modular page styles, clean navigation, and a projects system driven by JSON data.

title: List Manager
desc: Tkinter list manager with multi-list tabs, autosave to JSON, and add/edit/delete/reorder item workflows.

title: Expense Tracker
desc: CLI expense tracker with JSON persistence, add/update/delete flows, and clean tabular viewing output.

title: Hangman Trivia
desc: Tkinter trivia + hangman game that pulls questions from an external API and updates UI state per answer.

title: Fitness Tracker
desc: CLI analyzer for MyFitnessPal exports with summaries and Matplotlib visualizations (calories, macros, weight, exercise).

title: Mediocre Banker
desc: CLI bank account simulator with deposits/withdrawals/transfers, account folders, and JSON log files by date.

title: F1 Stats Visualizer
desc: F1 stats explorer using an API to chart standings and driver/team performance using Matplotlib.

title: Travel Planner
desc: CLI travel planner that validates date ranges, builds a packing checklist using rules, and saves itineraries to files.
